sn33:1.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn33:1.1.2: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn33:1.1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33:1.1.4: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:1.1.5: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33:1.1.6: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, aññāṇā, rūpasamudaye aññāṇā, rūpanirodhe aññāṇā, rūpanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇā;
sn33:1.1.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
sn33:1.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:1.1.11: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:1.1.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.
sn33:2.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33:2.1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:2.1.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:2.1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33:2.1.6: “Vedanāya kho, vaccha, aññāṇā, vedanāsamudaye aññāṇā, vedanānirodhe aññāṇā, vedanānirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇā;
sn33:2.1.8: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:2.1.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
sn33:2.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:2.1.11: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:2.1.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.
sn33:3.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33:3.1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:3.1.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:3.1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33:3.1.6: “Saññāya kho, vaccha, aññāṇā, saññāsamudaye aññāṇā, saññānirodhe aññāṇā, saññānirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇā;
sn33:3.1.8: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:3.1.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
sn33:3.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:3.1.11: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:3.1.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.
sn33:4.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33:4.1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:4.1.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:4.1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33:4.1.6: “Saṅkhāresu kho, vaccha, aññāṇā, saṅkhārasamudaye aññāṇā, saṅkhāranirodhe aññāṇā, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇā;
sn33:4.1.8: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:4.1.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
sn33:4.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:4.1.11: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:4.1.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.
sn33:5.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33:5.1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:5.1.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:5.1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33:5.1.6: “Viññāṇe kho, vaccha, aññāṇā, viññāṇasamudaye aññāṇā, viññāṇanirodhe aññāṇā, viññāṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇā;
sn33:5.1.8: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:5.1.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
sn33:5.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:5.1.11: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:5.1.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.
sn33:6-10.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33:6-10.1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:6-10.1.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:6-10.1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33:6-10.1.11: viññāṇe kho, vaccha, adassanā …pe… viññāṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya adassanā …pe….
sn33:11.1.2: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, anabhisamayā …pe… rūpanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya anabhisamayā …pe….
sn33:16.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
sn33:16.1.3: ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo …pe…
sn33:16.1.4: rūpe kho, vaccha, ananubodhā …pe… “rūpanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ananubodhā …pe….
sn33:21-25.1.1: Sāvatthinidānaṃ. Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo …pe….
sn33:21-25.1.2: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaṭivedhā …pe… viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaṭivedhā …pe….
sn33:26-30.1.2: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, asallakkhaṇā …pe… viññāṇe kho, vaccha, asallakkhaṇā …pe….
sn33:31-35.1.2: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, anupalakkhaṇā …pe… viññāṇe kho, vaccha, anupalakkhaṇā …pe….
sn33:36-40.1.2: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaccupalakkhaṇā …pe… viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaccupalakkhaṇā …pe….
sn33:41-45.1.2: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, asamapekkhaṇā …pe… viññāṇe kho, vaccha, asamapekkhaṇā …pe….
sn33:46-50.1.2: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaccupekkhaṇā …pe… viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaccupekkhaṇā …pe….
sn33:51.1.2: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn33:51.1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33:51.1.4: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:51.1.6: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33:51.1.7: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaccakkhakammā, rūpasamudaye appaccakkhakammā, rūpanirodhe appaccakkhakammā, rūpanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya appaccakkhakammā …pe….
sn33:52.1.2: “Vedanāya kho, vaccha, appaccakkhakammā …pe… vedanānirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya appaccakkhakammā …pe….
sn33:53.1.2: “Saññāya kho, vaccha, appaccakkhakammā …pe… saññānirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya appaccakkhakammā …pe….
sn33:54.1.2: “Saṅkhāresu kho, vaccha, appaccakkhakammā …pe… saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya appaccakkhakammā …pe….
sn33:55.1.2: “Viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaccakkhakammā, viññāṇasamudaye appaccakkhakammā, viññāṇanirodhe appaccakkhakammā, viññāṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya appaccakkhakammā;
sn33:55.1.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā …pe…
sn33:55.1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
sn33:55.1.6: Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33:55.1.7: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.
